name: Build job/course indexes + sitemap
on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'landers/job/**'
      - 'courses/**'
      - 'ooh_jobs.csv'
      - 'gen_job_landers.py'
      - 'build_indexes.py'
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 5 * * *'   # nightly 05:00 UTC
  workflow_dispatch: {}

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: write
      pull-requests: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.x'

      - name: Generate job landers (if CSV present)
        run: |
          python gen_job_landers.py || true

      - name: Build indexes, sitemap, robots
        run: |
          python build_indexes.py

      - name: Create Pull Request with generated files
        uses: peter-evans/create-pull-request@v6
        with:
          branch: chore/auto-indexes
          title: "chore(ci): auto-build job/course indexes & sitemap"
          body: |
            This PR was generated by CI.
            - Rebuilt /job/index.html and /courses/index.html
            - Updated sitemap.xml and robots.txt
          commit-message: "chore(ci): auto-build job/course indexes & sitemap"
          add-paths: |
            job/index.html
            courses/index.html
            sitemap.xml
            robots.txt
            landers/job/**
